metadata.title: WELLWAY Simple Bamboo Back Scratcher 3PCS 18‘’Length Natural Wooden Itch Massage Body Itch Scratcher Body Relaxation Tool for Itching Relief
features: You can now easily reach your back and scratch it without hurting your arm by using this back scratcher
Made of natural bamboo material green and environmentally friendly, the natural texture is clearly visible, full of natural breath,no poisons,tasteless,longer for use
Perfect to use for elderly people, pregnant women, and even for all ages
Length is 18 inch the elongated design Long handle that allows you to reach the backside easily, it also has a claw design on the end of this scratching stick
The drilling design is convenient for hanging and storing,the best gift for grandparents,father and mother,wife,husband or friends
description: It can be very annoying when you want to badly scratch your back but can’t reach it. Good thing there is this wood back scratcher that you can use. It has a nice wood design with a long handle and a claw design at the end. Moreover, this wood back scratcher is perfect for elderly people, pregnant women, and more.
